snippet: The announcement was taken as a sign that slower growth in China and the European debt crisis are ending a global boom in luxury goods.
abstract: Burberry says it has begun to see signs of weakness in the global luxury industry, predicting its annual profit will likely disappoint investors; reports that sales were flat at stores open a year or more so far in the quarter that begn in July, and that it expects profit for the financial year to be at the lower end of market expectations.
lead_paragraph: The announcement was taken as a sign that slower growth in China and the European debt crisis are ending a global boom in luxury goods.

headline.main: Burberry Warns of Weakness in Luxury Market
headline.print_headline: Burberry Sees Weak Sales, And Warns On Its Profit
